name: asynchronous-interactive
description: Asynchronously load interactive elements in the AMD-interactive format

scripts.build:lib: <transform ES6 to ES5 and put it to ./lib folder>
scripts.build:umd: <make a umd module and put it ./dist folder>
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:umd
